title: What do you think of the new SUPP ITEM??
body:
Curious to see what people think of the new item "REDEMPTION"? 

I like to heal sup and being a bit noob I'm hardly sure if an item is working or not!

replies.body:
I absolutely love it, however it does seem quite OP and will likely get nerfed, either in range or cost. 

It can change team fights, help in siege situations, negate the need to back after an objective such as baron/drag. The fact you can use it when dead is a bonus.
It's amazing. From few games experience, it has potential to turn teamfights around.
